title: Four Tiles Forming Square Stove Plate, 1937
creditline: Museum purchase from the Misses Hewitt Fund
description: Terra-cotta raised ornament on blue ground. German 18th Century style. A) has arch with heart and flowers in rayed circle. B) has arch enclosing stylized flowers and letters SF. S and D) together have cartouche with date 1756 and top inscription: "Las dich das be se n cht".

type.name: Four tiles forming square stove plate

tombstone.epitaph:
Four Tiles Forming Square Stove Plate, 1937.
1937. Glazed earthenware. Museum purchase from the Misses Hewitt Fund. 1937-62-1-a/d.
